description: Retrain the model after labeling data

cmd: cd /tmp; mkdir -p .neuro; echo $PROJECT_B64 | base64 -d > .neuro/project.yml; echo $BATCH_B64 | base64 -d > .neuro/training.yaml; echo $PARAMS_B64 | base64 -d > .neuro/params.yaml; neuro-flow --show-traceback bake training --meta-from-file .neuro/params.yaml --local-executor
